name: Drifloon
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Minimize
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Drifloon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.
